content.value:
BMI is a Group that doesn't stand still, and we don't want you to be either. We offer opportunities and support all of our employees in developing themselves and their careers, whether through training, internal promotion or by filling a different role within the company.

Our global footprint means that there are often opportunities in different countries. As we grow and evolve, new opportunities emerge that present attractive openings for our employees.

We want our employees to be as motivated as we are to do things better and to be leaders in our industry.

We will support you and help you find ways to be successful.
Get inspired

The BMI Group has a history of innovating and hiring people who have pushed the boundaries of established products and practices to improve them.

Whether it's to find a new way to incentivize staff to be more energy or waste conscious, or to design a completely new product or tool, we want to support you in making your ideas and inspiration a reality.

Even the simplest things can make a difference.
The right professional move for you

It may be that your current role is the right one for you, but you think training would help you do it even better. It may be that he is looking for a complete career change, or that he wants to develop new skills. Either way, BMI will help you take the next step in your career.
Useful links
Are you ready to take your next career path with BMI?

name.en-GB: Do you need to create a bituminous waterproofing?

title.en-GB: Do you need to create a bituminous waterproofing?

description.en-GB:
__Discover the products of BMI Siplast, the first producer of elastomeric SBS bitumen membranes.__

 The Siplast brand was founded in 1955 in France and has numerous innovations and patents in the field of waterproofing membranes for construction and civil engineering.

The ranges of BMI Siplast bituminous membranes are suitable for flat roofs for residential, industrial and commercial buildings. They find applications in single-layer roofs with heavy protection, in non-accessible multi-layer roofs or technical roofs.

The membranes are available in adhesive membranes with Adesolo G and Adepar JS, membranes with mechanical fixing (Parafor Solo GFM) or membranes with traditional smooth flame laying or with ceramic colored self-protection (Parafor Solo GS) or with metallic foil such as Paradial S.

BMI Siplast's commitment to environmental protection is realized with Cool Roof solutions for the improvement of living comfort, the containment of atmospheric pollution, or even green roofs.

Its long historical and geographical experience make BMI Siplast an authoritative referent for high-end products and services for waterproofing.

name.en-GB: How a solar thermal system works and how it can cover the need for hot water

title.en-GB: How a solar thermal system works and how it can cover the need for hot water

name.en-GB: In addition to the EverGuard BMI system

title.en-GB: In addition to the EverGuard BMI system

description.en-GB:
The complete __BMI EverGuard__ system includes the thermoplastic polyolefin (TPO) sealing mantle and related accessories: a thermal insulation layer, mechanical fastening systems and the vapor barrier.

__BMI EverGuard__ is ideal for roofing a wide range of buildings such as airports, sports facilities, commercial buildings, school buildings, hospitals, industry or even logistics.
It is no coincidence that the __EverGuard system__ has already been installed on 300 million square meters worldwide and its multilevel performances have allowed us to build an 18-year long success story. The system has strong points not only in the performance of the products and in the related Agreements. Technicians, but also in training courses for specialized BMI __RoofPro__ installers and in BMI guarantee programs.

In addition to the complete range of products, the __BMI RoofPro__ certified professional installer program allows you to achieve a level of great reliability for you, your partners and your customers.

With __BMI EverGuard__ and __BMI RoofPro__ Your roof is better protected for its full operational life and lasts as long as the performance levels that comprise it are:

- Technology
- Cover design
- Industrial competence of production processes
- Technical assistance
- Logistics

name.en-GB: Looking for solutions for your flat roof?

title.en-GB: Looking for solutions for your flat roof?

description.en-GB:
__BMI Italia gives you a consultancy service for your roofing project__

Whether it's a product consultancy or an executive project, __BMI Italia__ helps you find the right solutions for your roofing project according to the needs of the type of roofing or your end customer:

- We employ a network of professionals ready to intervene carefully for your home or business thanks to the experience gained over the years.
- __BMI Italia__ has devised the tools necessary to achieve a careful design choice with an approach that allows us to support architectural firms, companies and installers from the beginning of the project to complete implementation.
- Our __BMI Area designers__ accompany you with a tailor-made multidisciplinary service, to guide you in the best solutions that work for your flat or pitched roof.
